meanings.definition: Gluconates: Salts or esters of gluconic acid.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed gluconates to help with my calcium levels.
meanings.sent2: The gluconates in the solution acted as a stabilizer for the medication.
meanings.sent3: The gluconates threw a party in the body, inviting all the calcium ions to join!
meanings.sent4: Her bloodstream was a bustling city, with gluconates as the friendly neighbors.
meanings.sent5: In the chemistry lab, the students marveled at the versatility of gluconates.
